```{r}
# Generate a random sample
d=sample(x=1:25,size=50,replace=TRUE)
d
mean(d)
# Weighted means
grade=c(95,92,91,87)
weights= c(1/2,1/4,1/8,1/8)
mean(grade)
weighted.mean(x=grade,w=weights)
# Variance & SD
var(d)
sd(x=d,na.rm=FALSE)
# Min & Max Functions
min(d)
max(d)
median(d)
quantile(d,probs=c(0.2,0.4,0.6,0.8))
```
